title: Fixed route synchronization, added various raid-wide buff support to SimulationCraft integration, along with many other bugfixes.

changes.change: Creating various elements are now subject to rate limiting. You should never reach these limits on normal usage - but if you do let me know and I can expand them a bit. They're purely here to prevent abuse and/or attacks on the site.
Rating in route overview pages are now rounded off to 2 digits at max.
User bubbles of those viewing the route along with you, plus those when using route synchornization are now properly vertically/horizontally aligned.
[Hotfixed] Deleting a team no longer causes a crash.
Editing an object in combined floor mode twice in a row now no longer applies transformations twice - causing the object to moved to a place where it shouldn't be.
[Hotfixed] Enemy forces count is no longer sometimes used from a different mapping version than the one you had selected for your route.
Attempting to edit a deleted route no longer causes crashes - but instead gracefully fails by showing you a modal message instead.
Mountable areas no longer show up the absolute first time you access Keystone.guru.
Fixed display issues if your route somehow as their key levels not set.
Fixed placement of ads on route viewing pages.

Route change synchronization now works again. This was broken accidentally a while ago and I never found out. Anyway - it works again and I gave everything a thorough check-up and refresh. Should be good to go again!
Added support for Mark of the Wild, Skyfury Totem, Hunter's Mark and Power Infusion.
